articles.title: Two men guilty of murdering Lenasia teacher Naadira Vanker handed hefty jail sentences - News24
articles.description: Lucky Mshubi, 36, and Thabo Mambila, 31, broke into Vanker’s home in Lenasia South last April and kidnapped her.
articles.content:
• Lucky Mshubi, 36, and Thabo Mambila, 31, broke into Naadira Vanker's home in Lenasia South on 22 April 2021 and kidnapped her.

articles.title: Badminton: Singapore's men lose 3-2 to Indonesia in Asia Team C'ships semis - The Straits Times
articles.description:
They will return with historic bronze after qualifying for the Thomas Cup for just the third time.
. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Singapore's run at the Badminton Asia Team Championships ended at the semi-finals as the men's team tested defending champions Indonesia before losing 3-2 on Saturday (Feb 19).

articles.title: 'The tumour is getting bigger': Aaron Aziz delays surgery, braves through pain to complete his work - AsiaOne
articles.description: On Wednesday (Feb 16), Singaporean actor Aaron Aziz revealed on social media that he has to undergo surgery to remove a tumour. A 24-second clip of Aaron being put through a computerised tomography (CT) scanner accompanied the post, which has garnered 600,000…
